#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#define ll unsigned long long int
ll solve(int);

int main(){
    int T,N,ans;
    
    scanf("%d",&T);
    
    while(T--)
    {
      scanf("%d",&N);
      ans = solve(N);
      printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    
    return 0;
}

ll solve(int a){
    int x=a,sum=0;
    ll fin;
    
    while(a!=0)
    {
      sum+=a%10;
      a/=10;
    }
    
    fin = x*(pow(2,sum));
    
    return fin;
}
